mapper.insert: insert into contents(cno, title, writer, genre, g_detail, place, startdate, enddate, actors, starttime, episode, price, p_detail, summary, notice, explanation) values(contents_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{genre}, #{g_detail}, #{place}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{actors}, #{startTime}, #{episode}, #{price}, #{p_detail}, #{summary}, #{notice}, #{explanation})
mapper.select: select cno from contents where title = #{title}
mapper.insert: insert into c_files(filename, fileloca, realname, cno) values (#{fileName}, #{fileLoca}, #{realName}, #{cno})
